TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit XmlAttributes extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示控制 串行化和反序列化对象方式的属性对象的集合。

span.span: Represents a collection of attribute objects that control how the serializes and deserializes an object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 是替代 序列化类实例的默认方式的过程的一部分。Creating the is part of a process that overrides the default way the serializes class instances. 例如，假设您想要序列化从具有无法访问的源的 DLL 创建的对象。For example, suppose you want to serialize an object that is created from a DLL which has an inaccessible source. 通过使用 ，可以增加或控制序列化对象的方式。By using the , you can augment or otherwise control how the object is serialized. 类的成员 直接对应于控制序列化的特性类的系列。The members of the class correspond directly to a family of attribute classes that control serialization. 例如，必须将 属性设置为 ，这允许您通过指示将 属性值序列化为 XML 文本来重写字段或属性的序列化。For example, the property must be set to an , which allows you to override serialization of a field or property by instructing the to serialize the property value as XML text. 有关控制序列化的属性的完整列表，请参阅 。For a complete list of attributes that control serialization, see the . 有关将 和与类一起使用的详细信息 ，请参阅 [如何：指定 XML 流的替代元素名称](/dotnet/standard/serialization/how-to-specify-an-alternate-element-name-for-an-xml-stream)。For more details on using the with the class, see [How to: Specify an Alternate Element Name for an XML Stream](/dotnet/standard/serialization/how-to-specify-an-alternate-element-name-for-an-xml-stream). ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类的实例进行序列化 `Orchestra` ，其中包含一个名为的字段， `Instruments` 该字段返回对象的数组 `Instrument` 。The following example serializes an instance of a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为的第二个类 `Brass` 从 `Instrument` 类继承。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 该示例创建一个 对象来重写 `Instrument` 字段，允许字段接受 `Brass` 对象，并将该 对象添加到类的实例 。The example creates an object to override the `Instrument` field--allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects--and adds the object to an instance of the class. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttributes Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例对名为的类的实例进行序列化 `Orchestra` ，其中包含一个名为的字段， `Instruments` 该字段返回对象的数组 `Instrument` 。The following example serializes an instance of a class named `Orchestra`, which contains a single field named `Instruments` that returns an array of `Instrument` objects. 名为的第二个类 `Brass` 从 `Instrument` 类继承。A second class named `Brass` inherits from the `Instrument` class. 该示例创建一个 对象来重写 `Instrument` 字段，允许字段接受 `Brass` 对象，并将该 对象添加到类的实例 。The example creates an object to override the `Instrument` field--allowing the field to accept `Brass` objects--and adds the object to an instance of the class. span.span: Gets or sets the to override.
The to override.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可应用于在 反序列化时返回对象数组的成员。The can be applied to a member that returns an array of objects on deserialization. 这样，便可以 反序列化在要反序列化的对象中没有相应成员的任何属性，因此这些元素对于 "未知" 。This allows the to deserialize any attributes that do not have a corresponding member in the object being deserialized--thus those elements are "unknown" to the . 此方法在以下情况下很有用： XML Web service 中更改了 XML 流，或已知随机数据始终包含在 XML 流中。This is useful when the XML stream has been altered by an XML Web service, or when it is known that random data is always included with the XML stream. 属性允许你重写已应用的成员的序列化 。The property allows you to override the serialization of a member to which the has been applied.

summary.span: 获取要替代的 对象集合。

span.span: Gets the collection of objects to override.

value.span: 表示 对象集合的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可应用于在 反序列化时返回对象数组的成员。The can be applied to a member that returns an array of objects on deserialization. 这样，便可以 反序列化在要反序列化的对象中没有相应成员的任何元素，因此这些元素对于 "未知" 。This allows the to deserialize any elements that do not have a corresponding member in the object being deserialized--thus those elements are "unknown" to the . 此方法在以下情况下很有用： XML Web service 中更改了 XML 流，或已知随机数据始终包含在 XML 流中。This is useful when the XML stream has been altered by an XML Web service, or when it is known that random data is always included with the XML stream. 使用 属性可以重写成员的序列化，使其作为已应用到的成员 。The property allows you to override the serialization of a member to function as a member to which the has been applied. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新的 对象，并将其添加到通过属性访问的对象的集合中 。The following example creates a new object and adds it to the collection of objects accessed through the property. 然后，将 对象添加到 用于创建对象的对象 。The object is then added to a object which is used to create an object. 用于对对象进行序列化或反序列化。The is used to serialize or deserialize an object. 若要查看使用属性的效果 ，请在方法中运行方法来创建名为 "UnknownElements.xml" 的 XML 文档 `SerializeObject` `Main` 。To see the effect of using the property, create an XML document named "UnknownElements.xml" by running the `SerializeObject` method in the `Main` method. 编辑生成的文档以包含其他 (未知) 元素。Edit the resulting document to include other (unknown) elements. 注释掉 `SerializeObject` 方法中的调用 `Main` ，取消注释对方法的调用 `DeserializeObject` ，该方法输出任何未知 XML 元素的名称和值。Comment out the `SerializeObject` call in the `Main` method, and uncomment the call to the `DeserializeObject` method, which prints out the name and value of any unknown XML element. [!code-cpp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CPP/xmlanyover.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/CS/xmlanyover.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.XmlAnyElements/VB/xmlanyover.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 串行化返回数组的公共字段或读/写属性的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a public field or read/write property that returns an array.

value.span: 一个 ，指定 序列化如何返回数组的公共字段或读/写属性。

span.span: An that specifies how the serializes a public field or read/write property that returns an array.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有两种方法可用于返回数组的公共字段或公共读/写属性 ：默认序列化和受控序列化。There are two ways in which a public field or public read/write property that returns an array is serialized by the : the default serialization, and the controlled serialization. 在默认序列化中，无属性应用于成员。In the default serialization, no attribute is applied to the member. 序列化时，将数组序列化为 XML 元素的嵌套序列，并使用从成员名称获取的嵌套序列的 XML 元素名称。When serialized, the array is serialized as a nested sequence of XML elements with the XML element name of the nested sequence taken from the member name. 若要更精确地控制序列化，请将应用于 字段或属性。To control the serialization more precisely, apply an to the field or property. 例如，可以通过将 属性设置为新值，将生成的 XML 元素名称从默认值更改为其他名称。For example, you can change the generated XML element name from the default to a different name by setting the property to a new value. 属性允许你重写默认序列化，以及通过将应用到成员来控制的序列化 。The property allows you to override the default serialization, as well as the serialization controlled by applying an to the member. 例如，你可以将 (成员标识符) 生成的 XML 元素名称更改为新值。For example, you can change the XML element name generated from the default (the member identifier) to a new value. 此外，如果将应用于成员，则会被分配给该 属性的任何项重写 。In addition, if you apply an to a member, it is overridden by any that is assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个类，该类包含一个名为 `Members` 的字段，该字段返回对象的数组。The following example serializes a class that contains a field named `Members` that returns an array of objects. 用于重写字段的序列化，并将元素名称重命名为 `Staff` 。The is used to override the serialization of the field, and rename the element name to `Staff`. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArray Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象集合，该集合指定 序列化插入数组（由公共字段或读/写属性返回）的项的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a collection of objects that specify how the serializes items inserted into an array returned by a public field or read/write property.

value.span: 对象，它包含 对象的集合。

span.span: An object that contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性允许您指定可插入到由公共字段或公共读/写属性返回的数组中的派生类型。The property allows you to specify the derived types that can be inserted into an array returned by a public field or public read/write property. 对于希望字段或属性接受的每个新类型，创建一个 对象，并将其提供 给 属性返回的) 。For each new type you want the field or property to accept, create an object and it to the ) returned by the property. (新类型必须派生自字段或属性已接受的类型。将 对象 ) 到对象， 并指定包含该字段或属性的对象的类型，以及该字段或属性的名称。(The new type must be derived from the type already accepted by the field or property.) the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 在调用或方法之前用对象 构造 。Construct an with the object before calling or method. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个类，该类包含一个名为 `Members` 的字段，该字段返回对象的数组。The following example serializes a class that contains a field named `Members` that returns an array of objects. 创建了两个对象，以允许字段接受从名为的基类派生的对象 `Member` 。Two objects are created to allow the field to accept objects that derive from the base class named `Member`. 每个对象都通过属性添加到中 。Each object is added to the through the property. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlArrayItems Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 将公共字段或公共读/写属性串行化为 XML 特性的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a public field or public read/write property as an XML attribute.

value.span: 控制将公共字段或读/写属性序列化为 XML 特性的 。

span.span: An that controls the serialization of a public field or read/write property as an XML attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，如果没有属性应用于公共字段或公共读/写属性，则会将其序列化为 XML 元素。By default, if no attribute is applied to a public field or public read/write property, it is serialized as an XML element. 还可以 通过 将应用于字段或属性来指示生成 XML 特性。You can also instruct the to generate an XML attribute by applying an to the field or property. 属性允许你重写默认序列化，以及通过将应用到成员来控制的序列化 。The property allows you to override the default serialization, as well as the serialization controlled by applying an to the member. 为此，请创建一个 并将其属性设置 (如 ) 。To do this, create an and set its properties (such as ). 将新的对象分配给 对象的属性 。Assign the new object to the property of an object. 将 对象添加到 对象，并指定包含该字段或属性的对象的类型，以及该字段或属性的名称。Add the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. 最后， 使用对象创建， 并调用 或 方法。Lastly, create an using the object and call the or method. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为 `Group` 的类，该类包含一个名为的属性 `GroupName` ; 该 `GroupName` 属性序列化为 XML 特性。The following example serializes a class named `Group` that contains a property named `GroupName`; the `GroupName` property is serialized as an XML attribute. 该示例创建一个 和一个 对象，用于重写字段的默认序列化。The example creates an and an object to override the default serialization of the field. 然后，该示例创建一个 专门重写属性的，并将对象设置为属性，并将 对象添加到 具有指定的重写成员名称的对象。The example then creates an to specifically override the property, and the object is set to the property The object is added to the object with the name of the overridden member specified. 最后， 使用对象构造并返回 。Finally, an is constructed and returned using the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlAttribute Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: Gets or sets an object that allows you to distinguish between a set of choices.

summary.span: 获取或设置 XML 元素或属性的默认值。

span.span: Gets or sets the default value of an XML element or attribute.

value.span: 表示 XML 元素或属性的默认值的 。

span.span: An that represents the default value of an XML element or attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以通过将应用到成员来指定 XML 元素或 XML 特性的默认值 。You can specify the default value of an XML element or XML attribute by applying a to a member. 若要检查应用该值的结果，请将应用程序编译为 DLL 或可执行文件，并将生成的文件作为参数传递给 XML 架构定义工具 ( # A0) 。To examine the result of applying the value, compile the application into a DLL or executable, and pass the resulting file as an argument to the XML Schema Definition tool (XSD.exe). 在 XML 架构文档中，将为该属性分配一个默认值 `default` 。In the XML schema document, a default value is assigned to the `default` attribute. 在下面的示例中，元素的默认值 \ 为 "狗"。In the following example, the default for the \ element is "Dogs." ``` ``` 若要重写默认值，请创建， 并将其分配给 。To override the default value, create an and assign it to the . 如果分配给字段或属性的值等于该字段或属性的默认值，则不 会将值序列化为 XML 实例。If the value assigned to a field or property is equal to the default value for that field or property, the does not serialize the value to the XML-instance. 这是因为分配的值可以从 XML 架构中恢复。This is because the assigned value can be recovered from the XML schema. 换句话说，将字段或属性设置为其自身的默认值相当于根本不设置。In other words, setting a field or property to its own default value is equivalent of not setting it at all. 同样，如果没有为字段或属性设置任何值，则将 使用在该架构中找到的默认值。Likewise, if no value is set for the field or property, the uses the default value found in the schema. 在这两种情况下， (将属性设置为其默认值，或者根本不设置) ，则 XML 文档实例不包含属性的任何值。In both cases, (setting the property to its default, or not setting it at all), the XML-document instance does not contain any value for the property. 可以使用类构造函数而不是架构来分配默认值。You can use the class constructors instead of the schema to assign the default values. 如果使用 Xsd.exe 从架构中生成类，则可以注释掉或删除类文件中的所有 [DefaultValueAttribute ( "myFieldName" ) ] 特性。If you are using Xsd.exe to generate a classes from schemas, you can comment out or remove all of the [System.ComponentModel.DefaultValueAttribute("myFieldName")] attributes from the class files. ## Examples 下面的示例演示一个名为 `Pet` 的类，该类包含一个默认值设置为 "Dog" 的字段。The following example shows a class named `Pet` that contains a field that has a default value set to "Dog". 但是，该示例还将创建一个 对象，并将其 属性设置为新的默认值 ( "Cat" ) 。However, the example also creates an object, and sets its property to a new default value ("Cat"). 这会覆盖原始默认值。This overrides the original default value. 因此，如果字段值设置为 "Cat"，则会将 其视为默认值，而不会对其进行序列化。Thus, if the field value is set to "Cat", the treats it as the default value, and not serialize it. 如果将其设置为任何其他值，则将 序列化该值。If it is set to any other value, the serializes the value. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlDefaultValue Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

[<get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")>]

summary.span: 获取一个对象集合，该集合指定 将公共字段或读/写属性串行化为 XML 元素的方式。

span.span: Gets a collection of objects that specify how the serializes a public field or read/write property as an XML element.

value.span: 包含一个 对象集合的 。

span.span: An that contains a collection of objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于序列化为 XML 元素的每个重写成员，必须 通过调用 方法将新添加到。For each overridden member that is serialized as an XML element, you must add a new to an by calling the method. 默认情况下， 将创建一个对象并将其分配给 属性。By default, an object is created and assigned to the property. ## Examples 下面的示例对 `Transportation` 类进行序列化，该类包含一个名为 `Vehicles` 的字段，该字段返回 。The following example serializes the `Transportation` class, which contains a single field named `Vehicles` that returns an . 该示例将两个特性应用于 该 `Vehicles` 字段。The example applies two attributes to the `Vehicles` field. 该示例创建两个 对象，并将它们添加到 对象的集合中 。The example creates two objects and adds them to the collection of an object. 若要允许数组接受不同的对象类型，请将 对象添加到 对象。To allow the array to accept different object types, the object is added to the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlElements Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 串行化枚举成员的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

value.span: 指定 如何序列化枚举成员的 。

span.span: An that specifies how the serializes an enumeration member.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于要重写的每个标识符，必须创建一个 对象，并将 属性设置为 替代该标识符的。For each identifier you want to override, you must create an object, and set the property to an that overrides the identifier. 将 对象添加到 对象，并同时指定 包含枚举的类的和重写的成员名称。Add the object to the object and specify both the of the class that contains the enumeration, and the overridden member name. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化两个名为 `Food` 和 `FoodType` 的类。The following example serializes two classes named `Food` and `FoodType`. `FoodType`类包含两个被重写的枚举，并为每个枚举创建一个对象，该 对象将其分配给 对象的属性 。The `FoodType` class contains two enumerations that are overridden and, for each enumeration, the example creates an object that it assigns to the property of an object. 然后，该示例将 对象添加到 用于创建的对象 。The example then adds the object to an object, which is used to create an . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlEnum Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定 是否串行化公共字段或公共读/写属性。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether or not the serializes a public field or public read/write property.

value.span: 如果 不得序列化字段或属性，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the must not serialize the field or property; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，会通过序列化所有公共字段和公共读/写属性 。By default, all public fields and public read/write properties are serialized by the . 也就是说，每个公共字段或属性的值将作为 xml 元素或 xml 文档实例中的 xml 特性保存。That is, the value of each public field or property is persisted as an XML element or XML attribute in an XML-document instance. 若要重写字段或属性的默认序列化，请创建一个 对象，并将其 属性设置为 `true` 。To override the default serialization of a field or property, create an object, and set its property to `true`. 对象的对象， 并指定包含要忽略的字段或属性的对象的类型，以及要忽略的字段或属性的名称。 the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the field or property to ignore, and the name of the field or property to ignore. 如果 对某个字段或属性应用了，则忽略该字段或属性。If an is applied to a field or property, the field or property is ignored. 不过，您可以通过创建一个 对象，将其属性设置 为 `false` ，并将其添加到 对象（指定包含该字段或属性的对象的类型以及字段或属性的名称）来重写该行为。However you can override that behavior by creating an object, setting its property to `false`, adding it to an object specifying the type of the object that contains the field or property, and the name of the field or property. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化一个名为的类 `Group` ，该类包含一个名为的成员，该成员 `Comment` 应用于。The following example serializes a class named `Group`, which contains a member named `Comment` to which the is applied. 该示例创建一个 对象，并将 属性设置为 `false` ，从而重写 。The example creates an object, and sets the property to `false`, thereby overriding the . [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlIgnore Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指定当替代包含返回 对象的成员的对象时，是否保留所有的命名空间声明。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that specifies whether to keep all namespace declarations when an object containing a member that returns an object is overridden.

value.span: 如果应保留命名空间声明，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the namespace declarations should be kept; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例包含一个名为的类 `Student` 。The following example contains a class named `Student`. 类包含名为的成员 `MyNamespaces` ，该成员返回 对象。The class contains a member named `MyNamespaces` that returns an object. 该示例创建一个 添加到类的实例的对象 。The example creates an object that is added to an instance of the class. 属性设置为 `true` ，它指示在 重写对象的序列化时保留命名空间 `Student` 。The property is set to `true`, which instructs the to preserve the namespaces when the serialization of the `Student` object is overridden. [!code-cpp[XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example/CPP/xmlns.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example/CS/xmlns.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/XmlAttributes.Xmlns property example/VB/xmlns.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 将类串行化为 XML 根元素的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a class as an XML root element.

value.span: 重写特性化为 XML 根元素的类的 。

span.span: An that overrides a class attributed as an XML root element.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象、一个 对象和一个 对象。The following example creates an object, an object, and an object. 该示例将分配 给 对象的属性 ，并将该对象添加 到 对象。The example assigns the to the property of the object, and adds the object to the object. 最后，该示例通过将 序列化类的传递给对象来获取对象 。Lastly, the example gets the object by passing the of the serialized class to the object. (在此示例中， 为 `Group` 。 ) (In this example, the is `Group`.) summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指示 将公共字段或公共读/写属性串行化为 XML 文本。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that instructs the to serialize a public field or public read/write property as XML text.

value.span: 重写公共属性或字段的默认序列化的 。

span.span: An that overrides the default serialization of a public property or field.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 默认情况下，公共字段或公共读/写属性由序列化为 XML 元素 。By default, a public field or public read/write property is serialized as an XML element by the . 但是，它可以通过将应用 于字段或属性，强制将字段或属性序列化为 XML 文本。However, it can force the field or property to be serialized as XML text by applying an to the field or property. > [!NOTE] > 不能应用于返回数组的字段或属性。The cannot be applied to a field or property that returns an array. 若要重写未返回数组) 的字段或属性 (的默认序列化，请创建一个 并将其分配给 对象的属性 。To override the default serialization of a field or property (that does not return an array), create an and assign it to the property of an object. 将 对象添加到 对象，并指定包含重写的字段或属性的对象的类型，以及重写的字段或属性的名称。Add the object to an object and specify the type of the object that contains the overridden field or property, and the name of the overridden field or property. ## Examples 下面的示例序列化名为的类 `Group` ，该类包含一个名为的字段 `Comment` 。The following example serializes the class named `Group`, which contains a field named `Comment`. 若要重写 序列化字段的默认方式，该示例将创建一个 和一个 对象。To override the default way the serializes the field, the example creates an and an object. 然后，该示例创建一个 对象，并将其分配给 属性，并将该对象 (添加为要 序列化为 XML 文本) 到对象的字段名称 。The example then creates an object, which it assigns to the property, and adds the object (with the name of the field to be serialized as XML text) to the object. 最后，该示例 使用对象创建一个 。Lastly the example creates an using the object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlText Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个对象，该对象指定 串行化已对其应用 的类的方式。

span.span: Gets or sets an object that specifies how the serializes a class to which the has been applied.

value.span: 重写应用于类声明的 的 。

span.span: An that overrides an applied to a class declaration.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可用于控制如何对类型进行序列化 。The can be used to control how a type is serialized by the . 例如，默认情况下，在序列化类型时，将 使用类名称作为 XML 元素名称。For example, by default, when a type is serialized, the uses the class name as the XML element name. 通过创建 、将属性设置 为它和创建 对象，您可以更改 XML 元素的名称。By creating an , setting the property to it, and creating an object, you can change the XML element name. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个 对象，并将其分配给 对象的属性 。The following example creates an object, and assigns it to the property of an object. [!code-cpp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Classic XmlAttributes.XmlType Example/VB/source.vb#1)]
